Agentic examples LiteLLM Gen AI Hub
  • Welcome to Agentic examples LiteLLM Gen AI Hub’s documentation!
  • View page source

Welcome to Agentic examples LiteLLM Gen AI Hub’s documentation!

This repository contains examples of using various Agent Development Kits (ADKs) with SAP’s Generative AI Hub via LiteLLM. Users can access LLMs across all vendors (OpenAI, Google, Amazon, Mistral, SAP, etc.) available in the Generative AI Hub.

Agent Framework Examples:

  • Langgraph example with LiteLLM and SAP LLMs
    • How Langgraph works
    • Installation
    • Credentials for SAP Gen AI Hub
    • Run the Langgraph with LiteLLM and SAP LLMs
  • CrewAI example connecting to Sap Generative AI Hub via LiteLLM
    • How CrewAI works
    • Installation
    • Credentials for SAP Gen AI Hub
    • Run the CrewAI with LiteLLM and SAP LLMs
  • CrewAI Proxy example connecting to Sap Generative AI Hub via LiteLLM
    • How CrewAI works
    • CrewAI also supports the LiteLLM Proxy for access via OpenAI API calls.

    • Set env variables
